itunes:title: This Is the Old Testament Week 7 with Nancy Guthrie
title: This Is the Old Testament Week 7 with Nancy Guthrie
description:
For the last week of This Is the Old Testament, Raechel and Amanda are joined by author, teacher, and speaker Nancy Guthrie. As the three look at the last five books of the Old Testament, Nancy helps to set a framework for studying and understanding these prophetic books. From Habakkuk to Malachi, they continue to see God’s promise of salvation unfolding as the prophecies of the Old Testament look forward to fulfillment by Christ in the New Testament.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 7 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Old Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the Old Testament Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-old-testament-week-7-with-nancy-guthrie
